Sentencas: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glass sealants with bare and Mn-Co spinet coated SUS430 ferritic alloys are investigated.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy

Sentencas: The low-SrO glasses (<= 40 mol%) show good wettability and adherence to the bare SUS430 alloy due to their lower viscosity and negligible reactions with the alloy.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy

Sentencas: The high-SrO glass (e.g. 45 mol%) exhibits higher viscosity and more serious reactions with the bare SUS430 alloy.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy

Sentencas: The formation of SrCrO4 with higher CTE causes obvious delamination and dramatic oxidation of the alloy at the glass/alloy interface.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy

Sentencas: In contrast, Mn-Co spinel coating has good compatibility with both SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses and Fe-Cr ferritic alloy.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy

Sentencas: Moreover, the Mn-Co spinel coating on the alloy can effectively restrain the diffusion of Fe and Cr and the reactions between the glasses and the alloy.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy

Sentencas: Due to the ameliorated interfacial microstructure, sealing performance can be improved by applying the Mn-Co spine] coating on SUS430 alloy, especially for the bonded couple with high -Sr glass.
Titulo: Sealing performance and chemical compatibility of SrO-La2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glasses with bare and coated ferritic alloy
